quotes.quote: Live your life from your heart. Share from your heart. And your story will touch and heal people's souls.
Our hearts and souls are always the departing point for all thought, feeling and action.
What your heart thinks is great, is great. The soul's emphasis is always right.
We transform our relationships when we listen with our ears, hearts, and souls.
Loving someone can be hard at times. You risk a lot when you love - your heart and soul, at the least. Love is the most important and most rewarding investment you can make in another person.
Love is when he gives you a piece of your soul, that you never knew was missing.
Falling in love is more than infatuation. It is the need to feel whole, to feel safe, to be healed, to join together with someone, heart and soul.
An awakened man who is driven by his heart and soul, can touch the heart of a woman he loves, without touching her.
Only my heart can see your love and only my soul can feel your touch.

Your kiss tells me to wait. To never let go, to hold onto us and never lose hope. I feel it in my soul and know it in my heart. You're my true love since the beginning of time, it's been written in the stars.
When you welcome love with your whole heart, soul and body, love will welcome you with all its sweetness.
Love sees with the heart, thinks with the soul and grows greater when given away.
Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
Goodbyes are only for those who love with their eyes. Because for those who love with heart and soul there is no such thing as separation.
For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
In the end, we won't remember the most beautiful face and body. We'll remember the most beautiful heart and soul
The windows of my soul Always stare at you. Knowing, That you have the perfect heart, To make a home.
No matter how cold it gets, my heart and soul will forever warm for you.
One day someone will walk into your life.. open your heart and set your soul in fire.
A loving relationship is a wanting to celebrate, communicate, and know another's heart and soul.

I'll tell you...what real love is. It is blind devotion, unquestioning self-humiliation, utter submission, trust and belief against yourself and against the whole world, giving up your whole heart and soul to someone who smites it.
A soul connection knows no distance. The heart has no boundaries. Love transcends space and time. I love you with my heart and soul.
I will always lean my heart as close to your soul... As I can.
Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
You sleep more peacefully when your heart is full of love and dream beautifully when your soul is in love.
My love for you is past the mind, beyond my heart, and into my soul.
Love sees with the heart, thinks with the soul and grows greater when given away.
True love does not worry about the distance between, for the heart and soul travels through one's words.
Two souls with but a single thought, Two hearts that beat as one.
Love is a general acceptance of someone who is accepted by your heart and soul as part of your life.
True love comes from more than just the heart. It comes from your mind, your soul, and ever fiber of your being.
You are my soulmate, my sweetheart, you are my dream come true, from now until the end of time I give my hear and soul to you.
You are my heart, my soul, my treasure, my today, my tomorrow, my forever and my Everything!
Love connection starts from eyes to eyes, heart to heart, soul to soul.
When you kissed me with love in your heart, you owned my soul.
Here's my love, take it. Here's my soul, use it. Here's my heart, don't break it. Here's my hand, hold it and together we will make it forever.
